body.title: Navigation
body.elms:
```js
import { Navigation } from 'react-router'

React.createClass({
  mixins: [ Navigation ], ...
})

this
  .transitionTo('user', {id: 10})
  .transitionTo('/path')
  .transitionTo('http://...')
  .replaceWith('about')
  .makePath('about') // return URL
  .makeHref('about') // return URL
  .goBack()
```
